languages.text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.
languages.original_text: Персонаж больше не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждого врага с рукопашным оружием на соседних клетках. Вместо этого он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою для всех атак за каждого противника на соседних клетках.

traits.locale_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 Weapon Skill penalty for every additional enemy with melee weapons adjacent to them, and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy for all attacks.
The character no longer suffers a −10 Weapon Skill penalty for every additional enemy with melee weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

languages.text: El personaje ya no sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}habilidad de armas{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y en vez de eso gana +10 a su habilidad de armas por cada enemigo adyacente en todos los ataques.
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: El personaje ya no sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}habilidad de armas{/g} por cada enemigo adyacente con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo y en vez de eso gana +10 a su habilidad de armas por cada enemigo adyacente en todos los ataques.

languages.text: このキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を持つ敵が1体隣接するたびに受ける{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}への{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10を受けなくなり、代わりにすべての攻撃において隣接する敵1体につきWS+10を得る。
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を持つ敵が1体隣接するたびに受ける{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}への{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10を受けなくなり、代わりにすべての攻撃において隣接する敵1体につきWS+10を得る。

languages.text: 该角色进行攻击时，身边每位手持{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的敌人不再会让此角色受到-10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。相反，该角色身边每有一名敌人，所有的攻击都会获得+10武器技能。
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: 该角色进行攻击时，身边每位手持近战武器的敌人不再会让此角色受到-10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。相反，该角色身边每有一名敌人，所有的攻击都会获得+10武器技能。

languages.text: Der Charakter hat nicht länger −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} für jeden zusätzlichen Gegner mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} neben ihm und erhält stattdessen bei allen Angriffen +10 Waffenfähigkeit für jeden Gegner neben ihm.
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter erleidet nicht länger −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} für jeden zusätzlichen Gegner mit Nahkampfwaffen neben ihm und erhält stattdessen bei allen Angriffen +10 Waffenfähigkeit für jeden Gegner neben ihm.

languages.text: Le personnage est exempt de la {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 qui s'appliquait à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} pour chaque ennemi supplémentaire équipé d'armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} adjacent à sa position. Dorénavant, pour chaque ennemi adjacent, un bonus de +10 s'applique à la Capacité de combat, toutes attaques confondues.
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage est exempt de la {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 qui s'appliquait à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} pour chaque ennemi supplémentaire équipé d'armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} adjacent à sa position. Dorénavant, pour chaque ennemi adjacent, un bonus de +10 s'applique à la Capacité de combat, toutes attaques confondues.

languages.text: Персонаж больше не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждого врага с рукопашным оружием на соседних клетках. Вместо этого он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою для всех атак за каждого противника на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж больше не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждого врага с рукопашным оружием на соседних клетках. Вместо этого он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою для всех атак за каждого противника на соседних клетках.

Персонаж больше не получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждого врага с рукопашным оружием на соседних клетках. Вместо этого он получает +10 к Ближнему Бою для всех атак за каждого противника на соседних клетках.

languages.text: Karakter, artık bitişiğindeki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı kullanan her ilave düşman için −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} maruz kalmaz. Aksine bitişiğindeki her düşman için tüm saldırılarında +10 Silah Yeteneği kazanır.
languages.original_text: The character no longer suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} for every additional enemy with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons adjacent to them and instead gains +10 Weapon Skill for every adjacent enemy on all attacks.
